title: Plastic waste in the marine environment: A review of sources ...
body: Abstract This review article summarises the sources, occurrence, fate and effects of plastic waste in the marine environment. Due to its resistance to degradation, most plastic debris will persist in the environment for centuries and may be transported far from its source, including great distances out to sea.
readable_content: - DoNotOverlookTheDate (2023-12-08): You will read a part of a text that is sourced from a website
summary: The text discusses the impacts of banning plastic straws, emphasizing the importance of finding alternative options to reduce environmental harm. The sentiment is positive, highlighting the need for sustainable solutions. Sentiment: 0.8
